text: Wanting to keep her lonely life, but a little different from the one she was used to, a crab came out of the sea and went to live on the beach. A hungry whore saw him, and as she could find nothing better to eat, she ran to him and caught him. And the crab, ready to be devoured, said, I am worthy of all this; for I am a beast of the sea, and I have desired to behave as though I were a land-born. If you try to enter unknown territory, first take proper precautions.
title: La zorra y el cangrejo del mar
author: nan Esopo
